project.description: HW regression PGA system test (HW+IL+BLL) for Thunderbird 4x10G I/O Board

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_CHASSIS_IP
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: IP address of Spirent TestCenter chassis

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_SLOT_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Slot ID of Spirent test module (zero-based)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: STC_INSTALL_DIR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Spirent TestCenter BLL/UI installation target directory

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: FILTER
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.defaultValue: DEV_CI and HW_TBONAONIC and not slow and not disabled

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NUM_CPU
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Number of CPU (cores) available for parallel execution

scm.projectOptions: noallwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "prepare workspace" rm -rf ./${STC_INSTALL_DIR} rm -rf ./Spirent_TestCenter_Application_Linux_Server/
echo "get Spirent TestCenter BLL artifact" wget -nv http://jenkins.cal.ci.spirentcom.com:8080/view/integration_summary_ci/job/bll_linux/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/build/il/bld_bll-el3_x86/Release/bin/TestCenter.Linux.tar.gz
echo "extract application files" tar -zxf TestCenter.Linux.tar.gz mv ./Spirent_TestCenter_Application_Linux_Server/ ./${STC_INSTALL_DIR}
#ls -al
echo "use API/Python/StcPython.py" #mv ${STC_INSTALL_DIR}/StcPython.py ${STC_INSTALL_DIR}/StcPython.py.stak cp -f ${STC_INSTALL_DIR}/API/Python/StcPython.py ${STC_INSTALL_DIR}/
echo "free up some space" rm -rf TestCenter.Linux.tar.gz

export STC_PRIVATE_INSTALL_DIR=`pwd`/${STC_INSTALL_DIR}
#run test
tclsh regression/util/unittest/all.tcl
python regression/run.py --vm-user-id=ci_regression --stc-pkg-dir=${WORKSPACE}/${STC_INSTALL_DIR} -m \'${FILTER}\' -n ${NUM_CPU} --archive-tmpdir --keep-all-tmpdir --basetemp=${WORKSPACE}/${TMP_DIR} --hw=\'{\"TBONAONIC\" :[ \(\"//${STC_CHASSIS_IP}/${STC_SLOT_ID}/1\",\"//${STC_CHASSIS_IP}/${STC_SLOT_ID}/2\"\) ] }\'
